entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
